text: Hello. I'm working on the practicum for the CMS course. Though, I think this is just a general issue with styling modules. So, I have a menu that's in the footer and I'm working on getting the menu to match a 1100px container. But there are so many .rows and other classes added higher in the cascade by HubSpot that any class and style I add is cancelled out.
add a div in the footer and add your stuff there
that way footer stays full width and your content is centered in it
the classic HubSpot class name is "page-center"
The problem was the grid? since I was using `margin: 0 auto;` and a row always seems to get a `.row:first-child{ margin: 0; }` I just created a new first child and the problem was resolved
Thanks <@UD53A9UUR> & <@U7SL518D6>. I also did need more specificity
